      • Layer

        public Layer(@NonNull
             Dimension dimensions,
             Point position,
             ColorPalette colorPalette)
        Constructs a new Layer.
        Parameters:
        dimensions - The dimensions of the layer.
        position - The position of the layer within it's parent. If null, then the position (0, 0) is used.
        colorPalette - The color palette to color the layer with. If null, then the default color palette is used.
